Echelon: DJ

A guide on the current and upcoming features of the app

15%

Purpose

The DJ mode is currently a secondary feature. It's purpose is to allow a limited number of users add songs to the queue, however, everyone in the group will be able to listen to the music.

This feature is similar to the now defunct website "Turntable.fm". This website offered similar functionality.

Progress

Since this Echelon mode is not the current focus for the Alpha, it has not yet been directly worked on. So far, the only progress that it has seen is features and functionality that is shared with the Jukebox mode. These functionalities include the group page, invites, adding music, etc.

DJ mode is not currently available, however, you can try out the Jukebox now in the current closed Alpha. You can request an invitation at the link below:

Request Invitation
